attributes.action: Remove Mike Ashley and Dennis from Newcastle Utd, as their actions clearly detrimental to the future of our great club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the last 48hrs it has become clear that Newcastle manager, Kevin Keegan, has been undermined by the very board that profess to support him. Kevin Keegan has been treated disgracefully by an owner who knows the price of everything, and the value of nothing. Supported by a rag-bag collection of yes men.

I ask you to sign this petition in support of Kevin Keegan.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
